org.jerkar.api.depmanagement

Class JkScope.JkOptionableScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkScope
      • org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkScope.JkOptionableScope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    JkScope

    public static class JkScope.JkOptionableScope
extends JkScope
    A JkScope allowing to define other scope from it. It exists only to serve the fluent API purpose as for clarity we can't create derived scopes directly from a JkScope .
    Use the descr(String) method last as it returns a JkScope.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
